title: Demon’s Sweetheart - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Amnesia   Arranged Marriage   Beautiful Female Lead   Confinement   Family Business   Female Protagonist   Forced into a Relationship   Forced Marriage   Handsome Male Lead   Loner Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Yandere   Manipulative Characters   Modern Day   Obsessive Love   Older Love Interests   Possessive Characters   Strong Love Interests   Transplanted Memories   Unrequited Love   Wealthy Characters
author: Jin Yin Tong   金银童
description: After his death, the business giant Su Rui not only left his business empire to an outsider, but also entrusted his beloved daughter to that person. Su Lingxin really didn’t understand what is so good about that man named Gu Shaoxuan? Domineering, arrogant, and unreasonable, not only did he took everything that was supposed to belong to her, but also acted as if she is part of his possessions! On what basis did he have the right to do that?!>
